name: Fill Glass with Juice
description:
empty glass without juice is sad . Draw a line to fill up the glass with juice to be happy!

Try to find the smartest way to complete each level. You can be creative and come up with various solutions! Glass has feelings too . He may fall in love with you if you make him filled with juice .
Various levels to take your brain to the limits! Test your intelligence ! features :
* Draw whatever lines you want!
* Simple yet tricky puzzles * More loves will be added soon!
* It is going to keep you entertained for hours
